title: Having the Attitude of a Servant | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Having the Attitude of a Servant | Joel Osteen
description:
The key to living a fulfilled life is to look for opportunities to make a difference. When you make it a priority to meet the needs of others, God will always take care of meeting your needs. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
